title: England's Euro Final Elation
description:
The FC crew break down England's dominant victory over Sweden to advance to the Women's EURO Final and preview which stars will start in Sunday's Final. Meanwhile, Cristiano Ronaldo returns to the Man United training ground amid speculation he's setting up a return to Real Madrid, Paul Pogba is given an injury setback ahead of his Juventus return, and Thomas Tuchel criticizes his Chelsea squad early in the preseason.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: England ease past Sweden to advance to Women's EURO Final; Cristiano Ronaldo potentially setting up Real Madrid return; Paul Pogba's Juventus return takes a halt
